description: Episode of Series "Personality and Learning". Looks at the process of socialisation in the Dragon school, an Oxford preparatory school of some 600 pupils, mostly boys, but with 24 girls. Illustrates some of the values of the school, different teaching approaches and the attitude explicit and implicit to social control.
